name: Test Takeover Fails with Mismatched SPID and Token
description: Token of SP B but spId of SP A should be forbidden
descriptionHtml: Token of SP B but spId of SP A should be forbidden

labels.name: story
labels.value: Takeover fails because of mismatched spId and token

items.statusDetails:
AssertionError: Expected 403 Forbidden, got 201: 
assert 201 == 403
 +  where 201 = <Response [201]>.status_code

assert 201 == 403
 +  where 201 = <Response [201]>.status_code

AssertionError: assert 401 == 201

 +        where <dynaconf.base.LazySettings object at 0x7f0da5db2520> = secrets.debtor_service_provider
